Hero.title: Create Beautiful Family Newspapers
Hero.description: Transform your family's precious moments into stunning printed newspapers. Collaborate with loved ones to create personalized stories that connect generations.

Features.title: Why Families Love Kopkuabook?
Features.family_collaboration_desc: Invite family members to contribute photos, stories, and memories to create together.
Features.beautiful_layout_desc: Professional newspaper layout that make your family moments look stunning in print.
Features.delivered_monthly_desc: Receive beautifully printed newspapers delivered directly to your loved ones' doorstep.
Features.personal_touch_desc: Customize every aspect with personal messages, family recipes, and special announcements.
Features.precious_memories_desc: Preserve and share your family's most treasured moments in a tangible, lasting format.
Features.easy_to_add_photo_desc: Fast photo upload or drag-and-drop makes it easy for everyone in the family to contribute.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our products and services.
FAQ.return_policy_a: You can return unused items in their original packaging within 30 days for a refund or exchange. Contact support for assistance.
FAQ.track_order_q: How do I track my order?
FAQ.track_order_a: Track your order using the link provided in your confirmation email, or log into your account to view tracking details.
FAQ.shipping_a: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by location, and customs duties may apply for some countries.
FAQ.payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.payment_a: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay, ensuring secure payment options for all customers.
FAQ.damaged_item_q: What if I receive a damaged item?
FAQ.damaged_item_a: Please contact our support team within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damaged item. We'll arrange a replacement or refund.
FAQ.support_q: How can I contact customer support?
FAQ.support_a: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through the live chat on our website. We're available 24/7 to assist you.

Footer.company_description: Bringing families closer together through beautiful printed newspapers.

BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Terms.meta_description: Terms of service and conditions for using Kopkuabook
Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.section1_content: By accessing or using Kopkuabook, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
Terms.section2_content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Kopkuabook's website for personal, non-commercial viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
Terms.section3_content: The materials on Kopkuabook's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Kopkuabook makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties.
Terms.section4_content: In no event shall Kopkuabook or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Kopkuabook's website.
Terms.section5_content: The materials appearing on Kopkuabook's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Kopkuabook does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current.
Terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at terms@kopkuabook.com.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1_content: At Kopkuabook, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit our website and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
Privacy.section2_content: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including information by which you may be personally identified, such as name, email address, or billing information; and information about your internet connection and the equipment you use to access our website.
Privacy.section3_content: We use information that we collect about you or that you provide to us to present our website and its contents to you, provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us, fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it, and carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts.
Privacy.section4_content: We may disclose aggregated information about our users without restriction. We may disclose personal information that we collect or you provide to comply with any court order, law, or legal process, or to enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements.
Privacy.data_content: We have implemented measures designed to secure your personal information from accidental loss and from unauthorized access, use, alteration, and disclosure.
Privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information to improve and analyze our services.
Privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@kopkuabook.com.
